00045 SO_NODE_SOURCE( TAnalyzerParameter );
00046 
00047 void TAnalyzerParameter::initClass()
00048 {
00049         SO_NODE_INIT_CLASS( TAnalyzerParameter, SoNode, "AnalyzerResult" );
00050 }
00051 
00052 TAnalyzerParameter::TAnalyzerParameter()
00053 {
00054         SO_NODE_CONSTRUCTOR( TAnalyzerParameter );
00055         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( split, (1,1,1) );
00056         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( elemSize, (1.0) );
00057 
00058         SO_NODE_DEFINE_ENUM_VALUE( TypeInfoDisplayed, CURRENT_VALUE );
00059         SO_NODE_DEFINE_ENUM_VALUE( TypeInfoDisplayed, MIN_VALUE );
00060         SO_NODE_DEFINE_ENUM_VALUE( TypeInfoDisplayed, MAX_VALUE );
00061         SO_NODE_SET_SF_ENUM_TYPE( infoDisplayed, TypeInfoDisplayed );
00062         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( infoDisplayed, (CURRENT_VALUE) );
00063 
00064         theParent = NULL;
00065         SoFieldSensor* m_infoDisplayed = new SoFieldSensor( updateInfoDisplayed, this );
00066         m_infoDisplayed->attach( &infoDisplayed );
00067 /*      SoFieldSensor* m_SizeChange = new SoFieldSensor( updateSize, this );
00068         m_SizeChange->attach( &split );
00069         SoFieldSensor* m_SizeChange2 = new SoFieldSensor( updateSize, this );
00070         m_SizeChange2->attach( &elemSize );*/
00071 }
00072 
00073 TAnalyzerParameter::~TAnalyzerParameter()
00074 {
00075 }

00077 void TAnalyzerParameter::updateInfoDisplayed( void* data, SoSensor* )
00078 {
00079         TAnalyzerParameter* parameter = static_cast< TAnalyzerParameter* >( data );
00080         if (parameter->theParent)
00081         {
00082                 ((TAnalyzerKit * ) parameter->theParent)->DisplayResults();
00083         }
00084 }
00085 /*
00086 void TAnalyzerParameter::updateSize( void* data, SoSensor* )
00087 {
00088         TAnalyzerParameter* parameter = static_cast< TAnalyzerParameter* >( data );
00089         if (parameter->theParent)
00090         {
00091                 ((TAnalyzerKit * ) parameter->theParent)->UpdateSize();
00092         }
00093 }*/
00094 
00095 void TAnalyzerParameter::setParent( SoNode * parent )
00096 {
00097         theParent = parent;
00098 }
